nearby-pages-distance:
States distance to current location. Parameters:
* $1 - distance (in kilometers)
See also:
* {{msg-mw|nearby-pages-distance-meters}}
nearby-pages-distance-meters:
States distance to current location for numbers less than 1km.

Parameters:
* $1 - distance (in meters)
See also:
* {{msg-mw|nearby-pages-distance}}
nearby-pages-error: Text of generic error message when querying geodata API.
nearby-pages-error-guidance: Message explaining actions user can take when keying error {{msg-mw|nearby-pages-error}}
nearby-pages-noresults: Message shown when nothing is nearby
nearby-pages-noresults-guidance: Message explaining actions user can take when keying error {{msg-mw|nearby-pages-noresults}}
nearby-pages-permission-denied: Error message shown as alert when location was not found due to browser settings/permissions.
nearby-pages-location-unavailable: Error message shown as alert when location was not provided by the browser (example: not in range)
nearby-pages-requirements: Message shown to users who have no JavaScript or a browser that is not capable
nearby-pages-requirements-guidance: Message explaining actions user can take when keying error {{msg-mw|nearby-pages-requirements}}
nearby-pages-info-heading: Heading title for Nearby info page
